Question
========

A person achieves a score of 12.8 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 10.3 with a standard deviation 4.2. The z-score of the person with 12.8 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -0.65
* 0.6
* 0.83

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-0.65: Incorrect
* 0.6: Correct
* 0.83: Incorrect
